theHuman:HumanRelic.NAME: Thumbs Up
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b10 #yHealthiness and #b3 #yBlock.
NL NL Card Rewards have 4 choices instead of 3.
NL NL There are 4 levels of healthiness: Unhealthy ( < 8 ), Healthy ( 8 - 18 ), Very Healthy ( 18 - 25 ) and Extremely Healthy ( > 25 ).
NL NL You will obtain positive effects while you are healthy, and negative ones while you are unhealthy.
